name: Tema la taille du drap!
description:
Tema la taille du drap!

This game was created in 3 days for the CHRISTMAS UNREAL JAM 2021 hosted by IIM - Video Game School.

It is inspired by "Le drôle de Noël de Scrooge" (A Christmas Carol).

PITCH

Play as greed in human form, haunted by the ghosts of Christmas. Furious at your selfishness, they'll chase you down while you cowardly flee while picking up your nest egg scattered around your huge mansion. Equipped with a simple lantern, you will have to link speed and strategy in order to defeat the spirits! Become rich at the risk of your life!

CONTROLS

Z, Q, S , D to move.

Left Click to use your lantern.
